channel.title: No clients work for me, Answer isnt in FAQ
channel.description:
When i open up run.bat it says...
C:\Documents amd Settings\Sam Hughes\Desktop\Java -Xmx500m -jar client.jar 0 0 highmen members 0 'JAVA' is not reconized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
C:\Documents and Settings\Sam Hughes\Desktop>pause press any key to continue...
When i click edit it comes up
JAVA -Xmx500m -jar client.jar 0 0 highmem members 0 pause
what should i do? and i do have the latest java

item.title: No clients work for me, Answer isnt in FAQ
item.dc:creator: @X-xSamx-X X-xSamx-X
item.description:
@X-xSamx-X wrote:

When i open up run.bat it says…

C:\Documents amd Settings\Sam Hughes\Desktop\Java -Xmx500m -jar client.jar 0 0
highmen members 0
‘JAVA’ is not reconized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.

C:\Documents and Settings\Sam Hughes\Desktop>pause
press any key to continue…

When i click edit it comes up

JAVA -Xmx500m -jar client.jar 0 0 highmem members 0
pause

what should i do? and i do have the latest java
